acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Purchased from Goodspeed's Bookshop on July 18, 1969.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection is comprised of a letter send from James Fenimore Cooper, 1851 Nov 14, to Sarah-Floyd Jones concerning his father's death.
